tossup_question: 7) EARTH AND SPACE  What is the proper name of the star that is most commonly noted to have coordinates closest to the north celestial pole?
tossup_answer: ANSWER: NORTH STAR (ACCEPT: POLARIS or ALPHA URSA MINORIS)
bonus_question: 7) EARTH AND SPACE  What is the most well-known asterism in Ursa Major?
